#Text=Toronto 's Anime North 2019 brings thousands of fans together
#Text=Friday , May 31 , 2019
#Text=Canadian singer and cosplay model Jillea as Charizard .
#Text=Aerialist performance from Illuminair Entertainment .
#Text=Voice actor Alexis Tipton .
#Text=Many thousands of anime and manga fans descended on the Toronto Congress Centre for Anime North , a fan-run convention launched in 1997 .
#Text=Spread between four venues over three days , May 24 to 26 , the event featured J-pop maid idols , voice actors , writers , and more .
#Text=Wikinews attended .
#Text=Despite the ample indoor spaces , the parking lot of the Centre is also a hub of activity , with cosplayers posing for photos .
#Text=Attendees were sent running for cover on Saturday , as heavy rains and a severe thunderstorm warning put a damper on festivities .
#Text=The event is organized by a massive team of volunteers , and known for its specialized programming for fans , by fans .
#Text=On the night of May 25 , for example , attendees could catch " Pokemon Biology " , " Kimono Obi Tying " , and " Underappreciated Sports Anime/Manga . "

column1: #Text=Tipton held a panel on her career , dubbing anime for US distribution company Funimation Entertainment .
#Text=While many anime voice actors were n't fans going into the industry , Tipton recalled going to anime conventions with her friends during middle school and high school .

#Text=Once she was an invited guest , Tipton recalls realizing " oh , I 'm not here to just have fun , I 'm here to work ; I have a set schedule and I ca n't just , like , you know , go do what I want . "
#Text=Early in her career , Tipton was cast as a voice for My Bride is a Mermaid , a role that required singing .
#Text=Then just 19 years old , she looked at the role as a " chance to face my demons , " having questioned her abilities for years .
#Text=" I was in an extremely competitive [ singing musical theatre ] program in high school .

#Text= This director does n't know me , I have n't worked with him , he 's going to think that this is what I sound like , " she recalls thinking .

column1: #Text=" I do n't know if I had a shot to begin with , but now I really do n't have a shot . "
#Text=She was thrilled when she was cast .
#Text=Another voice actor , Lauren Landa , would list Sailor Neptune and Sailor Uranus as dream roles , when asked at conventions .
#Text=She was given a chance to audition for the characters years later , when Vizmedia dubbed the first two seasons of Sailor Moon .
#Text=When she was cast , " I swear to you , I was speechless , " she told an audience at her Q&A session .
#Text=Cosplay model and professional singer Jillea attended the Saturday of the convention dressed as Pokemon species Charizard .
#Text=Wikinews spoke with her by email , after the event :
#Text=( ( WN ) )
#Text=What got you into cosplay modelling ?

#Text=Jillea : My love for cosplay started with the community , what started as a fun hobby I would do periodically quickly became a huge part of my life , and the reason for that being how amazing the cosplay community embraced me and my work .
#Text=I 've always been a creative person , so getting to make my costumes and have people say ' oh my gosh , I love that character ! ! '
#Text=got me hooked right away .
#Text=They 're just my people , what can I say , they really make me feel welcomed and I love them for it .
#Text=( ( WN ) )
#Text=How did you choose Charizard ?
#Text=J : I 'm a 90 's baby so you could say I ’m a bit of a Pokémon OG !
#Text=I had a Game Boy as a kid and my very first purchase was Pokémon Red , solely based on how cool Charizard looked on the cover .
#Text=Charizard has always been my favourite Pokémon and I ca n’t resist a challenging cosplay ... and the nostalgia !
#Text=( ( WN ) )
#Text=What was your favourite part of Anime North ?
#Text=J : This was my very first time attending Anime North and I was blown away !
#Text=The booths were incredible and unique , every time I turned around I was seeing something different I 've never seen at a convention before .
#Text=Everything was easy to access and I even made use of the Cosplay Recharge station that literally saved the day with their hot glue !
#Text=Extremely friendly environment
#Text=it will not be my last time back for sure .
#Text=Wikinews ‍ ' Nick Moreau photographed the event .
#Text=Attendees play tabletop and card games , in a devoted hall .
